attributes.documentation:
Returns the % of the attacker/ attackee funds are for winning/ loosing
  we multiple the values by a base since solidity does not support
  floating values.
attributes.name: attackPrizeRatio

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "attack can not be completed at this block, please wait"

attributes.type: literal_string "attack can not be completed at this block, please wait"
attributes.value: attack can not be completed at this block, please wait

attributes.type: function (struct WarOfTokens.AttackInfo storage pointer,bytes32) view returns (address,uint256)

attributes.documentation:
if the attacker has a higher/ equal score to the attackee than the prize will be at max maxAttackPrizePercent
if the attacker has lower score than the prize can be higher than maxAttackPrizePercent since he takes a bigger risk
attributes.name: _calculateWinnings
